price: Por jo! Ata[192] do ta mohojnë adhurimin e tyre[193] dhe do të bëhen armiqtë e tyre.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
